newsitem.title: USA: Hilton says advisory body urges ITT vote.
newsitem.headline: Hilton says advisory body urges ITT vote.

text.p: Hilton Hotels Corp on Monday said an advisory organization recommended ITT Corp's board allow the company's shareholders to vote on Hilton's $70-per-share takeover bid.

Hilton said two reports by Institutional Shareholder Services recommended an ITT shareholder vote on Hilton's offer to buy the company for a combination of cash and stock. The organization also recommended a vote on the ITT board's own spin-off plan.

Last week ITT extended its tender offer to buy up to 30 million of its shares, or 26 percent of its outstanding stock, for $70 each until September 9. As of August 12 it said it collected 19 million shares in the tender offer, part of a reorganization that calls for dividing the company into three entities.
ITT's shares were up 1/16 at 62-3/4 on Monday, while Hilton's stock rose 5/8 to 30-3/8.
